About Me

Let me tell you a little bit about myself...

My Story...

My story began in a small village in Bulgaria.
I grew up in a house with no running water or bathroom inside. But I had a dream. I wanted to be a model. So I did it. When I was 21 I was on national TV and billboard commercials. And then I had an even bigger dream. To be a model in the United States. So when I was 26 I made it to the East Coast and worked with an agency in Boston.
Now, my dream is to be a great Web Developer, partner, father, and contributing human. And I work to achieve it with the same relentless tenacity every day.
